title: Police say several injured in Westport shooting
content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. - UPDATE, 8AM | Police say three people have been taken into custody in connection with the incident, and that three guns were recovered from the scene.
Investigators are still working to determine what started the incident.
EARLIER | Four people were injured in a shooting overnight in Westport.
Police say they were called out around 3:30 a.m. to the intersection of 40th and Pennsylvania on a reported shooting.
Officers arrived and located four victims, all suffering from non life-threatening injuries.
